item.title: Ram ends EV pickup truck plans

item.title: Via shrugs off tepid open to end first day of trading slightly above IPO price
item.description: Transit tech software startup Via had its IPO debut on Friday, starting at below offering price before rising to close at nearly $50.

item.title: Pilot union urges FAA to reject Rainmaker’s drone cloud-seeding plan
item.description: Rainmaker wants to use flares to seed clouds — the airline pilots' union says it won't be safe.

item.title: Google is a ‘bad actor’ says People CEO, accusing the company of stealing content
